::KitKat::

She followed behind Rowdy and the others.  She looked back to see if 
anything followed.  She couldn't see anything. She just turned her 
head around when she bumped into Rowdy.
"Ooofff. Sorry about that." She blushed a little and thanked the 
matrix it was too dark in the tunnel for the others to see her face 
turn red under the fur.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> 
> Terrorsaur followed Drillbit, watching his scanners. He wasn't 
happy with 
> crawling on his hands and knees. He was used to the air. Here, he 
was 
> grounded. "Go left," he said to Drillbit.
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf looked at KitKat and pinned his ears back. "I'm worried 
too, but 
> Quickstrike's a survivor." He ducked his head and followed Drillbit 
and 
> Terrorsaur.
>
